description: Run Intel Optimized LINPACK Benchmark on each selected node, on which Intel MKL should be installed as prerequisite.

description.2018: The Intel MKL 2018, installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.0.128/linux/mkl or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\compilers_and_libraries_2018.0.124\windows\mkl, will be used to run Intel Optimized LINPACK Benchmark.
description.2018 Update 1: The Intel MKL 2018 Update 1, installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.163/linux/mkl or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\compilers_and_libraries_2018.1.156\windows\mkl, will be used to run Intel Optimized LINPACK Benchmark.
description.2018 Update 2: The Intel MKL 2018 Update 2, installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.199/linux/mkl or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\compilers_and_libraries_2018.2.185\windows\mkl, will be used to run Intel Optimized LINPACK Benchmark.
description.2018 Update 3: The Intel MKL 2018 Update 3, installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.222/linux/mkl or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\compilers_and_libraries_2018.3.210\windows\mkl, will be used to run Intel Optimized LINPACK Benchmark.
description.2018 Update 4: The Intel MKL 2018 Update 4, installed in /opt/intel/compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274/linux/mkl or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\compilers_and_libraries_2018.5.274\windows\mkl, will be used to run Intel Optimized LINPACK Benchmark.

parameters.name: Max runtime
parameters.description: Specify the max time in seconds the test could run.
